name: Absolute Return Partners
overview:
Absolute Return Partners is a London based independent partnership controlled by 8 partners. They manage over $300 million in proprietary multi-manager & single manager products as well as bespoke portfolios.

ARP has established a powerful global network of corporate partners and advisers providing us with substantial resources. They focus on non-correlated alternative investment strategies with high barriers to entry in niche markets.
